titleStmt.title: A briefe account of some expressions in Saint Athanasius his Creed for the satisfaction of those who think themselves thereby oblig'd to believe all things therein contain'd to be absolutely necessary to Salvation.
titleStmt.author: Towerson, Gabriel, 1635?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hall for Tho. Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
